conceptGroups.description: The opening lines about cutting wind and collecting dreams

conceptGroups.description: Lines about what she has seen across mountains

conceptGroups.description: Lines about enduring winter to see someone

(tā áo guò màncháng dōngyuè)

(xiǎng jiàn nǐ yī miàn)

Bridge phrase: The purpose of enduring

(tā áo guò màncháng dōngyuè xiǎng jiàn nǐ yī miàn)

conceptGroups.description: Lines about sudden realization and memories
